item.label: T12 Compare Match on any channel
(0b0100) Capture T12 into CC60R/COUT60R on input CC60
(0b0101) CC60SR -> CC60R on rising edge CC60 input, T12 capture
(0b0110) CC60SR -> CC60R on falling edge CC60 input, T12 capture
(0b0111) CC60SR -> CC60R on any edge CC60 input, T12 capture
(0b1001) Hysteresis-like control mode with dead-time generation
(0b1010) T12 -> CC60R on rising edge CC60 input, T12 -> CC60SR on falling edge CCPOS60
(0b1011) T12 -> CC60R on falling edge CC60 input, T12 -> CC60SR on rising edge CCPOS60
(0b1100) T12 -> CC60R on rising edge CC60 input, T12 -> CC60SR on rising edge CCPOS60
(0b1101) T12 -> CC60R on falling edge CC60 input, T12 -> CC60SR on falling edge CCPOS60
(0b1110) T12 -> CC60R on any edge CC60 input, T12 -> CC60SR on any edge CCPOS60
(0b0100) Capture T12 into CC61R/COUT61R on input CC61
(0b0101) CC61SR -> CC61R on rising edge CC61 input, T12 capture
(0b0110) CC61SR -> CC61R on falling edge CC61 input, T12 capture
(0b0111) CC61SR -> CC61R on any edge CC61 input, T12 capture
(0b1001) Hysteresis-like control mode with dead-time generation
(0b1010) T12 -> CC61R on rising edge CC61 input, T12 -> CC61SR on falling edge CCPOS61
(0b1011) T12 -> CC61R on falling edge CC61 input, T12 -> CC61SR on rising edge CCPOS61
(0b1100) T12 -> CC61R on rising edge CC61 input, T12 -> CC61SR on rising edge CCPOS61
(0b1101) T12 -> CC61R on falling edge CC61 input, T12 -> CC61SR on falling edge CCPOS61
(0b1110) T12 -> CC61R on any edge CC61 input, T12 -> CC61SR on any edge CCPOS61
(0b0100) Capture T12 into CC62R/COUT62R on input CC62
(0b0101) CC62SR -> CC62R on rising edge CC62 input, T12 capture
(0b0110) CC62SR -> CC62R on falling edge CC62 input, T12 capture
(0b0111) CC62SR -> CC62R on any edge CC62 input, T12 capture
(0b1001) Hysteresis-like control mode with dead-time generation
(0b1010) T12 -> CC62R on rising edge CC62 input, T12 -> CC62SR on falling edge CCPOS62
(0b1011) T12 -> CC62R on falling edge CC62 input, T12 -> CC62SR on rising edge CCPOS62
(0b1100) T12 -> CC62R on rising edge CC62 input, T12 -> CC62SR on rising edge CCPOS62
(0b1101) T12 -> CC62R on falling edge CC62 input, T12 -> CC62SR on falling edge CCPOS62
(0b1110) T12 -> CC62R on any edge CC62 input, T12 -> CC62SR on any edge CCPOS62
(0b110) T12 compare match on Channel 0 (counting up)
(0b111) T12 compare match on Channel 0 (counting down)
